Header: Attorney General submits 21 thousand paged report to bring down Arjuna Mahendran
Content: The Attorney General handed over the Foreign Affairs and the Defence Ministries extradition request to bring down the main accused of the Central Bank Bond scam, former central bank governor, Arjuna Mahendran. Mahendran is believed to be domiciled currently in Singapore.
